0.8451em;"><span style="top: -2.655em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">m</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top: -3.394em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.345em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="mclose">)</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.294em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">или в более простой «duration‑like» записи (через численную вторую производную цены по ставке). Для совпадения с Excel обычно берут именно дискретную формулу с тем же <span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">m</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.4306em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">m</span></span></span></span>, что и купон.</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Шаблон выдаёт <code>0.58</code> — это значение Conv для бонда на дату анализа.</p>
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0">2.5. DV01</h2>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Классика:</p>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>D</mi><mi>V</mi><mn>01</mn><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⋅</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>N</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mi>N</mi></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">DV01 = D_{mod} \cdot P_{abs} \cdot 10^{-4} \cdot \frac{Notional}{N}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.22222em;">V</span><span class="mord">01</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.0278em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">m</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">o</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">d</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.13889em;">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.1389em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">ab</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">s</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8641em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">0</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.8641em;"><span style="top: -3.113em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">−</span><span class="mord mtight">4</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 2.0574em; vertical-align: -0.686em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.3714em;"><span style="top: -2.314em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.10903em;">N</span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top: -3.677em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.10903em;">N</span><span class="mord mathnormal">o</span><span class="mord mathnormal">t</span><span class="mord mathnormal">i</span><span class="mord mathnormal">o</span><span class="mord mathnormal">na</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.01968em;">l</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.686em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Если считать DV01 <strong>на 1 облигацию</strong> номиналом <span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">N = 1000</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.10903em;">N</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">1000</span></span></span></span>, то:</p>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>D</mi><mi>V</mi><msub><mn>01</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>b</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⋅</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">DV01_{1bond} = D_{mod} \cdot P_{abs} \cdot 10^{-4}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.22222em;">V</span><span class="mord">0</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">1</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">b</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">o</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">n</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">d</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.0278em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">m</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">o</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">d</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.13889em;">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.1389em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">ab</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">s</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8641em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">0</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.8641em;"><span style="top: -3.113em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">−</span><span class="mord mtight">4</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В шаблоне, судя по числу <code>45</code>, DV01, скорее всего, дан в рублях <strong>на 10 000 номинала</strong> (или другую фиксированную базу).<br>
Приблизительно:</p>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>D</mi><mi>V</mi><msub><mn>01</mn><mrow><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow></msub><mo>≈</mo><mn>0.45</mn><mo>⋅</mo><mn>963.4</mn><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext> </mtext><mn>000</mn><mo>≈</mo><mn>43</mn><mtext>&nbsp;RUB</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">DV01_{base} \approx 0.45 \cdot 963.4 \cdot 10^{-4} \cdot 10\,000 \approx 43 \text{ RUB}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.22222em;">V</span><span class="mord">0</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">1</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">ba</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">se</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≈</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">0.45</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">963.4</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8641em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">0</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.8641em;"><span style="top: -3.113em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">−</span><span class="mord mtight">4</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">10</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.1667em;"></span><span class="mord">000</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≈</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord">43</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mord">&nbsp;RUB</span></span></span></span></span></span>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">что близко к <code>45</code> с учётом округлений и точной купонной сетки.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">То есть при реализации вам надо зафиксировать <strong>базу DV01</strong> (1 облигация / 100k / 1m номинала) и масштабировать по тому же принципу.</p>
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0">2.6. G‑spread</h2>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">_</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><mtext>  </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mtext>b.p.</mtext><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>r</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>c</mi></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>4</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">G\_spread\;(\text{b.p.}) = (y - r_{gc}) \times 10^{4}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1.06em; vertical-align: -0.31em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">G</span><span class="mord" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">_</span><span class="mord mathnormal">s</span><span class="mord mathnormal">p</span><span class="mord mathnormal">re</span><span class="mord mathnormal">a</span><span class="mord mathnormal">d</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mord">b.p.</span></span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">y</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1.0361em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">r</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.0278em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">g</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">c</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">×</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8641em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">0</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.8641em;"><span style="top: -3.113em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">4</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16.55</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>⇒</mo><mn>0.1655</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">y = 16.55\% \Rightarrow 0.1655</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.625em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">y</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8056em; vertical-align: -0.0556em;"></span><span class="mord">16.55%</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">⇒</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">0.1655</span></span></span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>r</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>c</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>13.57</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>⇒</mo><mn>0.1357</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">r_{gc} = 13.57\% \Rightarrow 0.1357</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.7167em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">r</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.0278em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">g</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">c</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8056em; vertical-align: -0.0556em;"></span><span class="mord">13.57%</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">⇒</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mord">0.1357</span></span></span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.1655</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.1357</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>≈</mo><mn>298</mn><mtext>&nbsp;b.p.</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">(0.1655 - 0.1357) \cdot 10^{4} \approx 298\ \text{b.p.}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord">0.1655</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">0.1357</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8141em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">0</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.8141em;"><span style="top: -3.063em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">4</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">≈</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8889em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mord">298</span><span class="mspace">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mord">b.p.</span></span></span></span></span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Это ровно значение в шаблоне.</p>
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0">2.7. Критерии активности рынка</h2>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Из таблицы:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Дни торгов за период: <code>trading_days</code>.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Кол-во сделок: <code>num_trades</code>.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Объём торгов / объём выпуска: <code>turnover_ratio</code> (= <code>VAL_ACC.SUM / SumMarketVal</code>).</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Наличие торгов за последние 30 календарных дней: <code>has_trades_last_30d</code> (да/нет).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Логика:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>active = (trading_days &gt;= 5) and (num_trades &gt;= 10) and (turnover_ratio &gt;= 0.001) and has_trades_last_30d</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr class="bg-subtle h-px border-0" node="[object Object]">
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0 md:text-lg [hr+&amp;]:mt-4" id="3----python">3. Каркас реализации на Python</h2>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Ниже минимальный, но самодостаточный каркас без привязки к конкретной БД/источнику — вы можете подставить свои DataFrame’ы.</p>
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0">3.1. Базовые функции для кэшфлоу‑аналитики</h2>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">python</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; </span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">return</span><span> y  </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># как есть, если не сошлось</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">

</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"""
</span></span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    price_pct: чистая цена в % от номинала (например, 96.34)
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    nominal: номинал (1000)
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    cf_dates, cf_amounts: кэшфлоу
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    settlement_date: дата расчета
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    ytm: если None, решаем из цены; иначе используем заданный
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    m: число купонов в год
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    gcurve_yield: ставка G-curve (в долях единицы) на эту дюрацию
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    dv01_base_notional: база для DV01 (например, 10_000 или 1_000_000 номинала)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">    """</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    price_abs </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> price_pct </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">100.0</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> nominal
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    t </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> np</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>array</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span class="token token punctuation">[</span><span>year_fraction</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>settlement_date</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> d</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">for</span><span> d </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">in</span><span> cf_dates</span><span class="token token punctuation">]</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    cf </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> np</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>array</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>cf_amounts</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> dtype</span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">if</span><span> ytm </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">is</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        y </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> solve_ytm</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>price_abs</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> cf_dates</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> cf</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> settlement_date</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> m</span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span>m</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">else</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        y </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> ytm
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    df </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">1</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">+</span><span> y </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> m</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">**</span><span> </span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span class="token token operator">-</span><span>m </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> t</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    pv_cf </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> cf </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> df
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    pv_total </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> pv_cf</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">sum</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># Macaulay duration</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    D_mac </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> np</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">sum</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>t </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> pv_cf</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> pv_total
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># Modified duration</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    D_mod </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> D_mac </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> </span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">1</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">+</span><span> y </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> m</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># Convexity (дискретная)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    Conv </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> np</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">sum</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>cf </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> t </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> </span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>t </span><span class="token token operator">+</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">1</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> m</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> </span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">1</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">+</span><span> y </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> m</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">**</span><span> </span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span class="token token operator">-</span><span>m </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> t </span><span class="token token operator">-</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">2</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> pv_total
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># DV01</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">if</span><span> dv01_base_notional </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">is</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        dv01_base_notional </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> nominal  </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># DV01 на 1 облигацию по умолчанию</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    scale </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> dv01_base_notional </span><span class="token token operator">/</span><span> nominal
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    DV01 </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> D_mod </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> pv_total </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">1e-4</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">*</span><span> scale
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># G-spread</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    g_spread_bp </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">if</span><span> gcurve_yield </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">is</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">not</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>

</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">return</span><span> </span><span class="token token punctuation">{</span><span>

</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"convexity"</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> Conv</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>

</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"g_spread_bp"</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> g_spread_bp</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token punctuation">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0">3.2. Критерии активности</h2>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">python</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-weight: bolder;">def</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(197, 200, 198);">market_activity</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>trading_days</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> num_trades</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> turnover_ratio</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> has_trades_last_30d</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>                    min_trading_days</span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">5</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> min_trades</span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">10</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span> min_turnover_ratio</span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">0.001</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"""
</span></span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    turnover_ratio: объем торгов / объем выпуска (доля, не в %)
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    has_trades_last_30d: bool
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">    """</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    c1 </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> trading_days </span><span class="token token operator">&gt;=</span><span> min_trading_days
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    c2 </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> num_trades </span><span class="token token operator">&gt;=</span><span> min_trades
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    c3 </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> turnover_ratio </span><span class="token token operator">&gt;=</span><span> min_turnover_ratio
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    c4 </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">bool</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>has_trades_last_30d</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    active </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> c1 </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">and</span><span> c2 </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">and</span><span> c3 </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">and</span><span> c4
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">return</span><span> </span><span class="token token punctuation">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"active"</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> active</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"cond_trading_days"</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> c1</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"cond_num_trades"</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> c2</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"cond_turnover"</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> c3</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>        </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"cond_trades_last_30d"</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> c4</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token punctuation">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0">3.3. Пример использования под ваш шаблон</h2>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Допустим, у вас уже есть:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">фактические даты купонов и их суммы (из вашей БД/из Мосбиржи/из cbonds);</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">G‑curve‑ставка на дюрацию бонда;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">статистика торгов за период.</p>
</li>
</ul>

</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># Активность рынка (пример из шаблона)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>trading_days </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">20</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>num_trades </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">5357</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>turnover_ratio </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">0.0214</span><span>   </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># 2.14%</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>has_trades_last_30d </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">True</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>activity </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> market_activity</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    trading_days</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    num_trades</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    turnover_ratio</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    has_trades_last_30d
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">print</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>activity</span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># {'active': True, ...}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<hr class="bg-subtle h-px border-0" node="[object Object]">
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0 md:text-lg [hr+&amp;]:mt-4" id="4------excel">4. Как довести до «пиксель‑в‑пиксель» с Excel</h2>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Чтобы <strong>совпасть с шаблоном вплоть до последнего знака</strong>, надо:</p>
<ol class="marker:text-quiet list-decimal">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Восстановить <strong>точную купонную сетку</strong> (реальные даты из эмиссионной документации / cbonds).</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Уточнить <strong>day count</strong> и <strong>базу капитализации</strong> (скорее всего ACT/365F и дискретное с m = купонов в год, как в примере).</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Уточнить, на какую <strong>базу DV01</strong> считается число <code>45</code> (1 облигация, 10 000, 100 000 и т.п.) и зафиксировать её в коде.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Взять те же <strong>yield‑inputs</strong>, что и в Excel:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">YTM: с того же источника (Moex/cbonds).</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">G‑curve: те же значения КБД Мосбиржи для соответствующей дюрации.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Индексные доходности — из таблицы индексов в файле (RUGBITR1Y, RUCBTRAAANS и т.д.).</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Если нужно, можно:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">разобрать <strong>конкретный лист/диапазон</strong> из этого файла (например, где лежат данные G‑curve и индексов) и написать готовый код чтения через <code>pandas.read_excel</code> + расчёт всех итоговых показателей в точности, как в шаблоне;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">вынести всё в один класс <code>BondTemplateCalculator</code>, который на вход получает DataFrame по бумаге (как в этом xlsx), а на выход — ровно ту же таблицу <code>Template</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Если вы напишете, <strong>в каком именно окружении надо реализовать</strong> (Python‑бэкенд, SQL, VBA‑рефакторинг, JS/TypeScript на фронте), можно переписать этот каркас под конкретный стек и, при необходимости, довести формулы до точного совпадения с Excel (включая формат округления).</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="flex items-center justify-between"><div class="-ml-sm gap-xs flex flex-shrink-0 items-center"><button aria-label="Поделиться" id="radix-:ra:-content-default" tabindex="0" class="focus:outline-none" style=""><div class="flex flex-col gap-y-lg"><div class="bg-base erp-sidecar:pt-0 erp-mobile-sidecar:pt-0" style="opacity: 1;
