focus-within:opacity-100" aria-hidden="false"><button aria-label="Редактировать запрос" data-state="closed" type="button" class="reset interactable select-none [-webkit-user-drag:none] outline-none font-semimedium transition-[background-color,border-color,transform,color,opacity] duration-300 ease-out font-sans text-center items-center justify-center leading-loose whitespace-nowrap data-[state=open]:text-foreground data-[state=open]:bg-subtle text-quiet h-8 text-sm cursor-pointer origin-center active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo inline-flex rounded-full aspect-square p-0 aspect-[9/8] hover:text-foreground hover:bg-subtle"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="inline-flex" style="opacity: 1; transition: opacity 150ms 150ms;"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-pencil"></use></svg></div><div class="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center" style="opacity: 0; transition: opacity 150ms;"></div></div></button><button aria-label="Скопировать запрос" data-state="closed" type="button" class="reset interactable select-none [-webkit-user-drag:none] outline-none font-semimedium transition-[background-color,border-color,transform,color,opacity] duration-300 ease-out font-sans text-center items-center justify-center leading-loose whitespace-nowrap data-[state=open]:text-foreground data-[state=open]:bg-subtle text-quiet h-8 text-sm cursor-pointer origin-center active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo inline-flex rounded-full aspect-square p-0 aspect-[9/8] hover:text-foreground hover:bg-subtle"><div class="relative flex items-center justify-center"><div class="inline-flex" style="opacity: 1; transition: opacity 150ms 150ms;"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div><div class="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center" style="opacity: 0; transition: opacity 150ms;"></div></div></button></div><div class="group/title relative inline-flex flex-col"><div><div style="transition: none; overflow: hidden; height: 72px;"><div><div class="group/query relative whitespace-pre-line !text-wrap break-words [word-break:break-word] font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><div class="flex min-w-[48px] items-center justify-center bg-offset text-foreground rounded-2xl p-3 font-sans text-base font-normal select-none max-w-[600px]"><span class="select-text" style="overflow-wrap: anywhere;">А ты можешь прочитать функции, которые находятся в этом файле в каждой ячейке?</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="gap-y-lg flex flex-col"><div dir="ltr" data-orientation="horizontal" class="grid w-full min-w-0 grid-cols-[minmax(0,1fr)]"><div class="col-start-1 row-start-2" style="opacity: 1;"><div data-state="active" data-orientation="horizontal" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="radix-:r1do:-trigger-thread" id="radix-:r1do:-content-thread" tabindex="0" class="focus:outline-none" style="animation-duration: 0s;"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-transparent"><div class="gap-y-md flex flex-col"><div class="flex flex-col gap-sm"><div class="flex items-center gap-x-md justify-between"><div class="flex items-center gap-x-md justify-between w-full"><button type="button" class="reset interactable gap-x-0.5 select-none inline-flex items-center whitespace-nowrap text-quiet text-sm self-start hover:opacity-75 duration-quick rounded-md">2 шага выполнено<span class="duration-quick transition-transform ease-in-out text-quiet inline-flex rotate-0"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="14" height="14"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-chevron-right"></use></svg></span></button></div></div></div><div class="relative font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><div class="min-w-0 break-words [word-break:break-word]"><div dir="auto" id="markdown-content-4" class="gap-y-md after:clear-both after:block after:content-[&#39;&#39;]"><div class="my-2 first:mt-0 [&amp;:has([data-inline-type=image])+&amp;:has([data-inline-type=image])_[data-inline-type=image]]:hidden [&amp;:has(table)_[data-inline-type=image]]:hidden"><div class="relative"><div class="prose dark:prose-invert inline leading-relaxed break-words min-w-0 [word-break:break-word] prose-strong:font-medium [&amp;_&gt;*:first-child]:mt-0"><p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Короткий ответ: <strong>нет, из загруженного <code>.xlsx</code> я вижу только значения ячеек, а не исходные формулы Excel.</strong></p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Инструмент, через который мне отдают файл, уже преобразует его в «плоский» текст/таблицу с результатами вычислений (<code>96.34</code>, <code>16.55</code>, <code>ERROR:#VALUE!</code> и т.п.), без самих формул вида <code>=YIELD(...)</code>, <code>=DURATION(...)</code> и без ссылок вида <code>=C5/$B$2</code>. Поэтому:<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="Avtomatizirovannyi-shablon-1.8-1.xlsx" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden" style="mask-image: linear-gradient(to right, black 70%, transparent 100%);">Avtomatizirovannyi-shablon-1.8-1.xlsx</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">я <strong>не могу</strong>:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">посмотреть точный текст формулы в конкретной ячейке;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">увидеть, к каким диапазонам она ссылается;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">вытащить код VBA‑макросов из этого файла.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">я <strong>могу</strong> только:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">видеть итоговые числа и по ним восстанавливать логику расчёта (что я начал делать для YTM, duration, convexity, DV01, G‑spread и критериев активности);</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">сверять, совпадают ли мои формулы/код с тем, что даёт Excel по результатам.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Если нужно именно «считать формулы» как текст, есть несколько рабочих вариантов, как их сюда доставить:</p>
<ol class="marker:text-quiet list-decimal">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Excel включить <strong>отображение формул</strong>:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Формулы → Показать формулы (Show Formulas)</code></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">скопировать нужный диапазон и вставить как текст в сообщение (или сохранить как <code>.txt</code> / <code>.csv</code> и загрузить сюда).</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Для ключевых ячеек (где логика сложная) просто <strong>скопировать формулы вручную</strong> и прислать:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">например: формула ячейки, где считается <code>duration</code>, <code>convexity</code>, <code>DV01</code>, G‑spread и т.п.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Если у вас есть <code>.xlsm</code> с VBA:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">открыть редактор VBA, скопировать код модулей/макросов в <code>.txt</code> и приложить сюда.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">После этого можно будет:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">разобрать формулы/макросы буквально строка за строкой;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">переписать их в Python / SQL / JS или другой целевой язык;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">при необходимости – упростить/оптимизировать логику по сравнению с Excel.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Если хотите, можете начать с самых важных ячеек (например, где считаются <code>duration</code>, <code>duration_n</code>, <code>convexity</code>, <code>DV01</code>, G‑spread) — просто скопируйте формулы, и можно будет сделать точный «1‑в‑1» перенос в код.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="flex items-center justify-between"><div class="-ml-sm gap-xs flex flex-shrink-0 items-center"><button aria-label="Поделиться" [&amp;:has([data-inline-type=image])+&amp;:has([data-inline-type=image])_[data-inline-type=image]]:hidden [&amp;:has(table)_[data-inline-type=image]]:hidden"><div class="relative"><div class="prose dark:prose-invert inline leading-relaxed break-words min-w-0 [word-break:break-word] prose-strong:font-medium [&amp;_&gt;*:first-child]:mt-0"><h1 class="font-sans first:mt-xs mb-2 mt-4 font-semimedium text-lg leading-[1.5em] lg:text-xl" id="">Теперь формулы видны — что в них и как это использовать</h1>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><strong>Bottom line:</strong> в <code>paste.txt</code> действительно есть <strong>текст всех формул</strong> листа <code>Calculation</code>. Их можно читать и по ним восстанавливать точную логику: как тянутся цены, YTM, дюрация, G‑curve, G‑spread, рейтинги и индексы. Ниже — разбор ключевых блоков и как их интерпретировать.<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
<hr class="bg-subtle h-px border-0" node="[object Object]">
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0 md:text-lg [hr+&amp;]:mt-4" id="1">1. Как устроена «лента» расчёта по датам</h2>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Для первой строки расчётного блока (условно строка 6, та, что под «Информация») видны такие формулы:<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Цена по дням:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>=@CbondsClosePrice($B$1; D6; $B$27)
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Берёт <strong>цену бумаги с ISIN в B1</strong> на дату <code>D6</code> из Cbonds (через add‑in).</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Преобразование «Нет данных» в last‑observation‑carried‑forward:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>=ЕСЛИ(
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    ЕСЛИ(И(E6=""; D6=""); ""; ЕСЛИ(И(E6="Нет данных"; D6&lt;&gt;""); F7; E6)) = 0;
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    "";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    ЕСЛИ(И(E6=""; D6=""); ""; ЕСЛИ(И(E6="Нет данных"; D6&lt;&gt;""); F7; E6))
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">То есть если по дню «Нет данных», подставляется значение из следующей строки (F7), иначе берётся E6. Плюс фильтр нулей.<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Основной расчётный блок по дате <code>K6</code> (колонка «Date» / «Date Calc»):</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>=@ЕСЛИ(@CbondsClosePrice($B$1; K6; $B$27) = "Нет данных"; ""; CbondsClosePrice($B$1; K6; $B$27))
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=ЕСЛИОШИБКА(@ЕСЛИ($M$5="YTM";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                 CbondsCalcYTM($B$1; K6; L6);
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                 CbondsCalcYTP($B$1; K6; L6)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                ); "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=ЕСЛИОШИБКА(@ЕСЛИ($N$5="DURATION to maturity";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                 CbondsCalcDuration($B$1; K6; L6);
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                 CbondsCalcDurationToPutCall($B$1; K6; L6)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                ); "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=ЕСЛИОШИБКА(N6/365; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=ЕСЛИОШИБКА(@GCurve(K6; N6; $P$4)/100; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=ЕСЛИОШИБКА((M6-P6)*10000; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=ЕСЛИОШИБКА(M6*100; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=ЕСЛИОШИБКА(P6*100; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Где:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>CbondsCalcYTM</code> / <code>CbondsCalcYTP</code> — YTM / YTP из Cbonds‑дополнения;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>CbondsCalcDuration</code> / <code>CbondsCalcDurationToPutCall</code> — дюрация до погашения / до оферты;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>N6/365</code> → <code>D, YEAR</code>;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>GCurve(K6; N6; $P$4)</code> — ставка гос.кривой по дате и сроку, делится на 100 для перевода в доли единицы;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>(M6-P6)*10000</code> — <strong>G‑spread в б.п.</strong>.<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">То есть весь временной ряд на <code>Calculation</code> строится ровно так:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">дата → цена с Cbonds;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">цена → YTM/YTP и duration (через Cbonds UDF);</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">duration в днях → годы;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">duration и дата → G‑curve (через <code>GCurve</code>);</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">YTM – G‑curve → G‑spread.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr class="bg-subtle h-px border-0" node="[object Object]">
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0 md:text-lg [hr+&amp;]:mt-4" id="2-----duration-convexity-dv01">2. Итоговые параметры: купон, номинал, duration, convexity, DV01</h2>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В той же области, но в верхней части, отдельные ячейки с подписями <code>cpn_rate</code>, <code>current_fv</code>, <code>CouponPerYear</code>, <code>convexity</code>, <code>duration_n</code>, <code>duration</code> и т.п. используют либо параметры бумаги, либо функции <code>Efir*</code>:<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Примеры:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Купон:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>cpn_rate   = BondDateParams($B$1; $K$6; A11)
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">current_fv = BondDateParams($B$1; $K$6; A12)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">CouponPerYear = ReferenceParams($B$1; A13)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Здесь <code>BondDateParams</code> и <code>ReferenceParams</code> — функции Cbonds‑дополнения, которые тянут параметры выпуска (купон, номинал, количество купонов в год и т.д.).<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Выпуклость и модифицированная дюрация:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>convexity  = EfirYields($B$1; $K$6; A14)
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">duration_n = EfirYields($B$1; $K$6; A15)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">duration   = EfirEndOfDay($K$6; A16; LASTTRADEDATE; $B$10) / 365
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">По тексту видно, что:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>EfirYields</code> и <code>EfirEndOfDay</code> — <strong>внешние UDF из сервисов ЭФИР/Мосбиржи</strong>, не голый Excel;<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>duration_n</code> (0.45 в Template) и <code>convexity</code> (0.58) берутся не как «ручной» расчёт по кэшфлоу, а напрямую из этих функций;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>duration</code> нормируется на 365 (скорее всего, <code>A16</code>/<code>A18</code> задают режим: вернуть Macaulay‑дюрацию/срок до погашения в днях).</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">То есть Excel‑модель <strong>опирается на vendor‑функции</strong>:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><strong>Cbonds UDF</strong>: <code>CbondsClosePrice</code>, <code>CbondsCalcYTM</code>, <code>CbondsCalcDuration</code>, <code>CbondsIndexValue</code>, <code>BondDateParams</code>, <code>ReferenceParams</code>, <code>InstrumentRatings</code>.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><strong>ЭФИР/Мосбиржа UDF</strong>: <code>EfirYields</code>, <code>EfirEndOfDay</code>, <code>EfirHistoryAgg</code> и др..<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В чистом Excel без этих надстроек эти формулы не будут работать.</p>
<hr class="bg-subtle h-px border-0" node="[object Object]">
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0 md:text-lg [hr+&amp;]:mt-4" id="3">3. Критерии активности и агрегаты</h2>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Внизу блока <code>Calculation</code> формулы для активности рынка и агрегатов по торгам:<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Сбор статистики по последним 30 дням:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>=EfirHistoryAgg($B$1; J6-30; J6-1; "DOI")   // количество торговых дней
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=EfirHistoryAgg($B$1; J6-30; J6-1; "DO")    // количество сделок
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">=EfirHistoryAgg($B$1; J6-30; J6-1; "DOL")   // объем торгов
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Сопоставление с объёмом выпуска:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>=ReferenceParams($B$1; L21)   // SumMarketVal, объем в обращении
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">А уже на <code>Template</code> это превращается в:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Кол-во торговых дней</code>, <code>Кол-во сделок</code>, <code>Объем торгов / объем выпуска в обращении</code>;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">и дальше через <code>ЕСЛИ(...)</code> — в флажки «выполняется / не выполняется».</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr class="bg-subtle h-px border-0" node="[object Object]">
<h2 class="mb-2 mt-4 font-sans font-semimedium text-base first:mt-0 md:text-lg [hr+&amp;]:mt-4" id="4">4. Ответ на ваш исходный вопрос</h2>
<ol class="marker:text-quiet list-decimal">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><strong>Да, сейчас функции читаются.</strong><br>
Через <code>paste.txt</code> виден весь текст формул по листу <code>Calculation</code> (и другим листам): стандартные Excel‑функции + UDF надстроек Cbonds и ЭФИР.<span class="inline-flex" aria-label="paste.txt" data-state="closed"><span class="citation-nbsp"></span><span class="citation inline" rel="nofollow noopener"><span class="relative -mt-px select-none whitespace-nowrap -top-px cursor-pointer font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><span class="text-3xs rounded-badge group min-w-4 cursor-pointer text-center align-middle font-mono tabular-nums py-[0.1875rem] leading-snug px-[0.3rem] [@media(hover:hover)]:hover:bg-subtler border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtle"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current tabler-icon shrink-0 -mt-px inline-block align-middle opacity-80 mr-xs" width="12" height="12"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-paperclip"></use></svg><span class="relative -mt-px inline-block align-middle max-w-[25ch] overflow-hidden">paste.txt</span></span></span></span>​</span></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><strong>Что дальше можно сделать:</strong></p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">взять интересующие диапазоны (например, K6:P20 и отдельные ячейки <code>convexity</code>, <code>duration_n</code>, <code>duration</code>);</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">по уже видимым формулам:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">выписать входы/выходы каждой UDF;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">заменить их на эквивалентные расчёты в Python (YTM, duration, convexity, DV01), а данные по ценам/кривым/индексам тянуть уже не из Excel‑дополнений, а из своих источников;</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">при необходимости — реализовать «обёртку», которая будет просто эмулировать поведение <code>CbondsCalcYTM</code>, <code>GCurve</code>, <code>EfirYields</code> и т.д.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Если хочешь, можно дальше <strong>взять один конкретный блок</strong> (например, строку 6 или ячейки <code>convexity</code>/<code>duration_n</code>) и переписать их один‑к‑одному в Python/TypeScript, показав, какие именно данные должны приходить вместо вызова каждой UDF.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="flex items-center justify-between"><div class="-ml-sm gap-xs flex flex-shrink-0 items-center"><button aria-label="Поделиться" ссылок на какие‑либо внешние файлы.
