<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>Ты — старший количественный разработчик (sell-side / risk / structuring level). Задача — ВОССТАНОВИТЬ и ПОЛНОСТЬЮ ПЕРЕПИСАТЬ на Python сложный Excel‑шаблон аналитики облигаций.
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">ИСХОДНАЯ МОДЕЛЬ (Excel), КОТОРУЮ НУЖНО РЕПЛИЦИРОВАТЬ
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Ниже описана логика Excel‑книги (листов "Calculation" и "Template") и типовые формулы. Самого файла у нас НЕТ — есть только это текстовое описание. Нужно реализовать аналогичную функциональность в виде чистой Python‑библиотеки.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1. Общая постановка
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Шаблон рассчитан на анализ ОДНОЙ облигации, например:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- ISIN: RU000A103943
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Дата выпуска: 17.06.2021
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Дата погашения: 11.06.2026
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Купон: 8.35% годовых
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Купонов в год: 4
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Номинал: 1 000 RUB
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Лист `Calculation` содержит исторический ряд по бумаге:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- на каждую дату торгов хранятся:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - `Date`, `Date Calc`
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - `CLOSE` — цена в % от номинала
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - `YTM` — доходность к погашению
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - `DURATION to maturity` — срок до погашения в днях
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - `D, YEAR` — срок в годах (дни / 365)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - `G-Curve, %` — ставка гос. кривой
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - `G-spread, b.p.` — G‑спред в б.п.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - при наличии оферты — `YTP` и `G-Curve` для срока до оферты
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - рейтинги эмиссии/эмитента/гаранта
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - доходности индексов Мосбиржи по разным рейтинг‑корзинам.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Лист `Template` формирует «человеческий» отчёт, где:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- отображается вся статическая информация по выпуску;
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- приводятся критерии активности рынка (кол-во торговых дней, сделок, оборот/объём, наличие торгов в последние 30 дней);
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- выводятся текущие:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - котировка, YTM, дюрация (Macaulay), мод. дюрация, выпуклость, DV01;
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - G‑спред и значение G‑кривой;
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- показывается сравнение доходности бумаги с:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - доходностями индексов гос. облигаций (RUGBITR1Y, RUGBITR3Y, RUGBITR5Y, RUGBITR5+);
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  - индексами корпоративных облигаций по рейтинг‑корзинам (AAA, AA, A, BBB).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">2. Ключевые формулы и зависимости в Excel (их нужно реплицировать функционально)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">2.1. Цена и перенос «Нет данных»
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В столбце дневных цен используются формулы вида:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Базовый вызов (псевдо‑формула):
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  `CLOSE_raw(date_i) = CbondsClosePrice(ISIN, date_i, market_code)`
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Обработка отсутствующих данных:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  ```excel
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">  =ЕСЛИ(
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">       ЕСЛИ(И(Ei=""; Di=""); ""; ЕСЛИ(И(Ei="Нет данных"; Di&lt;&gt;""); Fi+1; Ei)) = 0;
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">       "";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">       ЕСЛИ(И(Ei=""; Di=""); ""; ЕСЛИ(И(Ei="Нет данных"; Di&lt;&gt;""); Fi+1; Ei))
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Логика: если в ячейке цены <code>"Нет данных"</code>, подставить значение из следующей строки (last observation carried forward); иначе — фактическое значение.</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Python это нужно реализовать как:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">ряд цен с переносом последнего ненулевого значения вперёд, если данных нет.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">2.2. Доходность, дюрация, G‑кривая, G‑спред</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">На <code>Calculation</code> для каждой расчётной даты <code>K_i</code> (обычно это дата торгов) используются формулы вида:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span># Цена
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">price_i = CbondsClosePrice(ISIN, K_i, market_code)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"># Выбор режима YTM/YTP
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">M5 = "YTM" или "YTP"
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">M_i = ЕСЛИ(M5="YTM";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">           CbondsCalcYTM(ISIN, K_i, L_i);
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">           CbondsCalcYTP(ISIN, K_i, L_i))
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"># Выбор режима дюрации до погашения / до оферты
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">N5 = "DURATION to maturity" или аналог
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">N_i = ЕСЛИ(N5="DURATION to maturity";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">           CbondsCalcDuration(ISIN, K_i, L_i);
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">           CbondsCalcDurationToPutCall(ISIN, K_i, L_i))
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"># Срок в годах
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">D_YEAR_i = N_i / 365
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"># G-кривая
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">G_i = GCurve(K_i, N_i, P4) / 100
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"># G-спред (в б.п.)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">G_spread_i = (M_i - G_i) * 10000
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Где:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>M_i</code> — доходность в долях единицы (0.1655 = 16.55%);</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>G_i</code> — ставка G‑curve в долях единицы (0.1357 = 13.57%);</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>G_spread_i</code> — разность в б.п. (298.48 и т.п.).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Python всё это надо заменить на:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">расчёт YTM по кэшфлоу (если нет в данных);</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">расчёт дюрации как разницы между датой расчёта и датой погашения / оферты;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">интерполяцию G‑кривой по дате и сроку;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">G‑спред как <code>(ytm - gcurve) * 10_000</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">2.3. Статические параметры выпуска</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Excel для параметров используются вызовы вида:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>cpn_rate      = BondDateParams(ISIN, K_ref, "couponrate")
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">current_fv    = BondDateParams(ISIN, K_ref, "currentfacevalue")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">CouponPerYear = ReferenceParams(ISIN, "numcoupons")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">FaceFTName    = ReferenceParams(ISIN, "currency")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">EndMtyDate    = BondDateParams(ISIN, K_ref, "endmtydate")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">BegDistDate   = BondDateParams(ISIN, K_ref, "begdistdate")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">SumMarketVal  = ReferenceParams(ISIN, "summarketval")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Python нужно:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">описать dataclass <code>BondStatic</code> с этими полями;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">получать их не из UDF, а из входных данных/конфигурации.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">2.4. Дюрация, мод. дюрация, выпуклость, DV01</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Excel используются внешние функции <code>EfirYields</code> и <code>EfirEndOfDay</code>:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>convexity  = EfirYields(ISIN, K_ref, "convexity")
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">duration_n = EfirYields(ISIN, K_ref, "modified_duration")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">duration   = EfirEndOfDay(K_ref, "duration_to_maturity", LASTTRADEDATE, ref) / 365
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">А также DV01, завязанный на duration и цену.</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Python нужно воспроизвести стандартную облигационную математику:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Генерация кэшфлоу (купонные даты и суммы).</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Решение YTM из уравнения цены:</p>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" fence="true">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mrow></msup></mfrac></mrow><annotation </li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Macaulay duration:</p>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" </li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Modified duration:</p>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>D</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>D</mi><mi>M</mi></msub><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>m</mi></mfrac></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">D_{mod} = \frac{D_M}{1 + \frac{y}{m}}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.0278em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">m</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">o</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">d</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 2.3913em; vertical-align: -1.031em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.3603em;"><span style="top: -2.314em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">+</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.7475em;"><span style="top: -2.655em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">m</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top: -3.4461em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">y</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.345em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top: -3.677em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3283em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.0278em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right: 0.10903em;">M</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.031em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Convexity (дискретная, согласованная с Excel):</p>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac><munder><mo>∑</mo><mi>i</mi></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>i</mi></msub><mo>⋅</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>i</mi></msub><mo>⋅</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>i</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mi>m</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo fence="true">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>i</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">Conv = \frac{1}{P_{abs}} \sum_i \frac{CF_i \cdot t_i \cdot (t_i + 1/m)}
                                      {\left(1 + \frac{y}{m}\right)^{m t_i + 2}}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.07153em;">C</span><span class="mord mathnormal">o</span><span class="mord mathnormal">n</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">v</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 2.721em; vertical-align: -1.294em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.3214em;"><span style="top: -2.314em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.13889em;">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">ab</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">s</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top: -3.677em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">1</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.836em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.1667em;"></span><span class="mop op-limits"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.05em;"><span style="top: -1.8723em; margin-left: 0em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3.05em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">i</span></span></span><span style="top: -3.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3.05em;"></span><span><span class="mop op-symbol large-op">∑</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.2777em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.1667em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.427em;"><span style="top: -2.11em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3.054em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="minner"><span class="minner"><span class="mopen delimcenter" style="top: 0em;"><span class="delimsizing size1">(</span></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">+</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.7475em;"><span style="top: -2.655em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">m</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top: -3.4461em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.143em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mbin mtight">+</span><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.284em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3.054em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top: -3.731em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3.054em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.07153em;">C</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.13889em;">F</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3117em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.1389em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">i</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:
