0.2222em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal">t</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3117em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">i</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal">t</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3117em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">i</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">+</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mord">1/</span><span class="mord mathnormal">m</span><span class="mclose">)</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.294em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">DV01:</p>
<span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>D</mi><mi>V</mi><mn>01</mn><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>D</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⋅</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><mfrac><mtext>base_notional</mtext><mi>N</mi></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">DV01 = D_{mod} \cdot P_{abs} \cdot 10^{-4} \cdot \frac{\text{base\_notional}}{N}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.6833em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.22222em;">V</span><span class="mord">01</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.0278em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">m</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">o</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">d</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8333em; vertical-align: -0.15em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.13889em;">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span style="top: -2.55em; margin-left: -0.1389em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">ab</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">s</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8641em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord">0</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.8641em;"><span style="top: -3.113em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">−</span><span class="mord mtight">4</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.2222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 2.0804em; vertical-align: -0.686em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 1.3944em;"><span style="top: -2.314em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.10903em;">N</span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span><span style="top: -3.7em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord text"><span class="mord">base_notional</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.686em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">где <code>base_notional</code> — настраиваемый базовый номинал (чтобы DV01 ≈ 45, как в Excel).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">2.5. Индексы и сравнение с ними</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Excel подтягивает доходности индексов через:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>IndexYield("RUGBITR1Y")    = CbondsIndexValue("RUGBITR1Y", Date_ref)
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">IndexYield("RUCBTRAAANS")  = CbondsIndexValue("RUCBTRAAANS", Date_ref)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">IndexYield("RUCBTRAANS")   = CbondsIndexValue("RUCBTRAANS", Date_ref)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">IndexYield("RUCBTRANS")    = CbondsIndexValue("RUCBTRANS", Date_ref)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">IndexYield("RUCBTRBBBNS")  = CbondsIndexValue("RUCBTRBBBNS", Date_ref)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">и т.д.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Python нужен dataclass:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">python</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span class="token token decorator annotation punctuation">@dataclass</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">class</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(129, 162, 190);">IndexYields</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    rugbitr1y</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    rugbitr3y</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    rugbitr5y</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    rugbitr5plus</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    rucbtraaans</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    rucbtraans</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    rucbtrans</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    rucbtrbbbns</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">None</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">и функция, которая по дате возвращает эти значения (из DataFrame или иного источника).</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">2.6. Критерии активности рынка</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Excel агрегирует историю через функции вида:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>trading_days = EfirHistoryAgg(ISIN, J_ref-30, J_ref-1, "DOI")
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">num_trades   = EfirHistoryAgg(ISIN, J_ref-30, J_ref-1, "DO")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">turnover     = EfirHistoryAgg(ISIN, J_ref-30, J_ref-1, "DOL")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">issue_volume = ReferenceParams(ISIN, "summarketval")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">turnover_ratio = turnover / issue_volume
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Дальше в <code>Template</code>:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">сравнение с порогами:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">trading_days ≥ 5</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">num_trades ≥ 10</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">turnover_ratio ≥ 0.001 (0.10%)</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">наличие торгов за последние 30 дней (trading_days &gt; 0)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">итоговый флажок «активный рынок», если все условия выполнены.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Python нужно:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">python</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span class="token token decorator annotation punctuation">@dataclass</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">class</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(129, 162, 190);">MarketActivityResult</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    trading_days</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">int</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    num_trades</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">int</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    turnover_ratio</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    has_trades_last_30d</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">bool</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    is_active</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">bool</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">и функция, которая считает это по DataFrame с историей торгов.</p>
<ol class="marker:text-quiet list-decimal" start="3">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">ТРЕБОВАНИЯ К PYTHON‑РЕАЛИЗАЦИИ</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">3.1. Язык и стек</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Python 3.11</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Использовать <code>pandas</code>, <code>numpy</code>, <code>dataclasses</code>, <code>datetime</code>.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Везде использовать type hints.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Код писать в продакшн‑стиле (читаемый, тестируемый, без глобального состояния и «магических чисел»).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">3.2. Структура модулей</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Предложенная структура (можно скорректировать, но должна быть логичной):</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>models.py</code></p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>BondStatic</code></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Cashflow</code></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>IndexYields</code></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>MarketActivityResult</code></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>BondTemplateResult</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>bond_math.py</code></p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">генерация кэшфлоу</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">решатель YTM</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">дюрации, выпуклость, DV01</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>curves.py</code></p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">функции <code>get_gcurve_yield(date, maturity_years)</code></p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">функции для получения доходностей индексов и обёрток над ними</p>
</li>

</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">

<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>build_bond_template(...)</code> — аналог листа <code>Template</code></p>

<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">3.3. Интерфейсы функций</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Реализуй минимум следующие функции:</p>

</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    gcurve_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    use_market_ytm</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">bool</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token boolean">True</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">-</span><span class="token token operator">&gt;</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">def</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(197, 200, 198);">compute_market_activity</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    market_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    analysis_date</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>Timestamp</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    issue_volume</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    lookback_days</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">30</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    min_trading_days</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">5</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    min_num_trades</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">10</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    min_turnover_ratio</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">0.001</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">-</span><span class="token token operator">&gt;</span><span> MarketActivityResult</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">def</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(197, 200, 198);">build_bond_template</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    bond</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> BondStatic</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    market_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    gcurve_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    index_yields_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    analysis_date</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>Timestamp</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    base_notional_for_dv01</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">10_000.0</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">-</span><span class="token token operator">&gt;</span><span> BondTemplateResult</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">3.4. Пример и верификация</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Сделай как минимум один пример/тест, в котором:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Жёстко задана конфигурация облигации:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">номинал 1 000, купон 8.35%, 4 купона в год, реальная дата погашения.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Для одной даты заданы:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">цена 96.34%,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">YTM 16.55%,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">G‑кривая 13.57%,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">срок до погашения ≈ 0.52 года.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Проверяется, что:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">рассчитанная Macaulay duration ≈ 0.52,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">modified duration ≈ 0.45,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">convexity ≈ 0.58,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">G‑спред ≈ 298.48 б.п. (с допуском по округлению).</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ol class="marker:text-quiet list-decimal" start="4">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">ПРИНЦИПЫ</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">НЕ пытайся автоматически парсить Excel‑формулы — используй их смысл (описанный выше) как ТЗ.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Цель — функциональная эквивалентность: при подаче тех же входов Python‑код должен возвращать такие же (или очень близкие) числа, как Excel‑модель.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Код должен быть:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">модульным;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">легко тестируемым;</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">готовым к встраиванию в систему риск‑/структурных расчётов.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

везде</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="gap-y-lg flex flex-col"><div dir="ltr" data-orientation="horizontal" class="grid w-full min-w-0 id="radix-:r13d:-content-thread" tabindex="0" class="focus:outline-none" style=""><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-transparent"><div class="gap-y-md flex flex-col"><div transition-transform ease-in-out text-quiet inline-flex rotate-0"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="14" height="14"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-chevron-right"></use></svg></span></button></div></div></div><div class="relative font-sans text-base text-foreground selection:bg-super/50 selection:text-foreground dark:selection:bg-super/10 dark:selection:text-super"><div class="min-w-0 break-words [word-break:break-word]"><div dir="auto" id="markdown-content-11" class="gap-y-md after:clear-both after:block after:content-[&#39;&#39;]"><div class="my-2 first:mt-0 [&amp;:has([data-inline-type=image])+&amp;:has([data-inline-type=image])_[data-inline-type=image]]:hidden [&amp;:has(table)_[data-inline-type=image]]:hidden"><div class="relative"><div class="prose dark:prose-invert inline leading-relaxed break-words min-w-0 [word-break:break-word] prose-strong:font-medium [&amp;_&gt;*:first-child]:mt-0"><h1 class="font-sans first:mt-xs mb-2 mt-4 font-semimedium text-lg leading-[1.5em] lg:text-xl" id="cursor-ai------excel">Промт для Cursor AI с максимально явными ссылками на Excel‑формулы</h1>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Ниже текст, который можно <strong>целиком вставить в Cursor</strong> как системный / workspace‑промт.<br>
Он описывает, <strong>как именно считалось всё в исходном Excel</strong>, с явными формулами, и что нужно сделать на Python «с нуля».</p>
<hr class="bg-subtle h-px border-0" node="[object Object]">
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>Ты — старший количественный разработчик (sell-side / risk / structuring). Твоя задача — ПОЛНОСТЬЮ ПЕРЕПИСАТЬ в виде Python‑библиотеки сложный Excel‑шаблон аналитики облигаций.
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Excel‑файла у нас НЕТ. Но ниже подробно описана структура листов "Calculation" и "Template" и КЛЮЧЕВЫЕ ФОРМУЛЫ, которые там использовались. Считай это техническим заданием: надо воспроизвести ту же логику в Python.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">ОБЩИЕ ТРЕБОВАНИЯ К PYTHON‑РЕАЛИЗАЦИИ
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Python 3.11, использовать type hints.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Использовать `pandas`, `numpy`, `dataclasses`, `datetime`.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Код модульный, без глобального состояния.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Никаких vendor‑UDF (Cbonds, Efir и т.п.) — их нужно ЗАМЕНИТЬ прозрачной математикой и абстракциями доступа к данным.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Цель: чтобы, подав те же входные ряды, получить те же (или очень близкие) результаты, что Excel.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">======================================================================
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1. СТРУКТУРА И ЛОГИКА ЛИСТА "CALCULATION"
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">======================================================================
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Лист "Calculation" содержит исторический ряд по ОДНОЙ облигации.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Пусть:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- ISIN облигации находится в ячейке `B1`.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Выбранный рынок (код площадки) — в `B27`.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Верхняя строка данных — условно `строка 6`.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Ниже — КЛЮЧЕВЫЕ СТОЛБЦЫ и РЕАЛЬНЫЕ ФОРМУЛЫ Excel, которые нам нужно воспроизвести по смыслу.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1.1. Цена (CLOSE) и обработка "Нет данных"
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В Excel, для каждой строки i:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1) Сырая цена по дате `D[i]`:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    CLOSE_raw[i] := =@CbondsClosePrice($B$1; D[i]; $B$27)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">2) «Очишенная» цена (E[i]/F[i]) с переносом последнего значения вперёд:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    =ЕСЛИ(
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">         ЕСЛИ(И(E[i]=""; D[i]=""); "";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">              ЕСЛИ(И(E[i]="Нет данных"; D[i]&lt;&gt;""); F[i+1]; E[i])
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">         ) = 0;
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">         "";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">         ЕСЛИ(И(E[i]=""; D[i]=""); "";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">              ЕСЛИ(И(E[i]="Нет данных"; D[i]&lt;&gt;""); F[i+1]; E[i])
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">         )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">      )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">ЛОГИКА:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Если в ячейке с ценой `"Нет данных"` и дата не пустая — взять цену из следующей строки (F[i+1]).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Если цена пустая и дата пустая — оставить пусто.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Если результат ноль — тоже пусто.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В PYTHON:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Для колонки `close_pct` реализовать forward‑fill (last observation carried forward) при пропусках/флагах "Нет данных".
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Хранить цену в % от номинала.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1.2. Блок расчёта по колонке даты K[i] (основной временной ряд)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Предполагается, что в колонке `K` — расчётная дата `Date`, а в `L` — дополнительный аргумент (например, цена или YTM).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Для каждой строки i в Excel:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">(a) Цена по расчётной дате:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    CLOSE_K[i] := =@ЕСЛИ(@CbondsClosePrice($B$1; K[i]; $B$27) = "Нет данных";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                         "";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                         CbondsClosePrice($B$1; K[i]; $B$27)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                        )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">(b) Доходность (выбор YTM или YTP):
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    M5 содержит режим: "YTM" или "YTP"
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    YIELD[i] := =ЕСЛИОШИБКА(
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                    @ЕСЛИ($M$5 = "YTM";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                          CbondsCalcYTM($B$1; K[i]; L[i]);
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                          CbondsCalcYTP($B$1; K[i]; L[i])
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                         );
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                    ""
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                 )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">(c) Дюрация в днях (до погашения или до оферты):
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    N5 содержит режим: "DURATION to maturity" или "DURATION to put"
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    DURATION_DAYS[i] := =ЕСЛИОШИБКА(
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                            @ЕСЛИ($N$5 = "DURATION to maturity";
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                                  CbondsCalcDuration($B$1; K[i]; L[i]);
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                                  CbondsCalcDurationToPutCall($B$1; K[i]; L[i])
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                                 );
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                            ""
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">                         )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">(d) Дюрация в годах:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    D_YEAR[i] := =ЕСЛИОШИБКА(N[i] / 365; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">(e) Гос. кривая (G‑curve):
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    G_CURVE[i] := =ЕСЛИОШИБКА(@GCurve(K[i]; N[i]; $P$4) / 100; "")
