</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Т.е. UDF `GCurve` возвращает ставку в процентах, её делят на 100.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">(f) G‑спред:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    G_SPREAD_BP[i] := =ЕСЛИОШИБКА( (M[i] - P[i]) * 10000; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">где `M[i]` — YTM в долях единицы, `P[i]` — G‑curve в долях единицы.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">(g) Для отчётного вывода Excel также считает:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    YTM_percent[i] := =ЕСЛИОШИБКА(M[i] * 100; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    Gcurve_percent[i] := =ЕСЛИОШИБКА(P[i] * 100; "")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В PYTHON:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Считать, что `market_df` уже содержит либо цены, либо YTM.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Если YTM нет, решать её из цены (см. блок 2).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Дюрацию в днях можно, как минимум, получить как `(maturity_date - date).days`.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- G‑кривую получать через отдельную функцию (см. ниже).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- G‑спред в б.п. считать по формуле выше.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1.3. Статические параметры выпуска (вверху Calculation)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В Excel параметры вроде купона, номинала, дат, валюты и т.д. берутся через UDF:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    cpn_rate        := =BondDateParams($B$1; $K$6; A11)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    current_fv      := =BondDateParams($B$1; $K$6; A12)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    CouponPerYear   := =ReferenceParams($B$1; A13)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    FaceFTName      := =ReferenceParams($B$1; A17)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    EndMtyDate      := =ReferenceParams($B$1; A9)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    BegDistDate     := =ReferenceParams($B$1; A8)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    SumMarketVal    := =ReferenceParams($B$1; A8)  # объём в обращении и т.п.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В PYTHON:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Описать dataclass `BondStatic` с соответствующими полями (ISIN, issue_date, maturity_date, coupon_rate, coupon_frequency, face_value, issue_amount и др.).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Эти поля должны приходить из входных данных/конфигурации, а не из UDF.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1.4. Дюрация, мод. дюрация, выпуклость (convexity)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В Excel используются UDF ЭФИР:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    convexity  := =EfirYields($B$1; $K$6; A14)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    duration_n := =EfirYields($B$1; $K$6; A15)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    duration   := =EfirEndOfDay($K$6; A16; LASTTRADEDATE; $B$10) / 365
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Здесь:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- `duration` — дюрация к погашению в годах (0.52 в примере).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- `duration_n` — модифицированная дюрация (0.45).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- `convexity` — выпуклость (0.58).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В PYTHON нужно реализовать явную математику облигаций, которая даёт такие же величины:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1) Сгенерировать все будущие денежные потоки от settlement date:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   - купоны: `CF_coupon = coupon_rate * face_value / coupons_per_year` на каждую дату купона;
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   - последний поток: `CF_last = CF_coupon + face_value`.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">2) Решить YTM по уравнению:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   P_abs = sum( CF_i / (1 + y/m)^(m * t_i) )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   где:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   - `P_abs` — чистая цена в валюте (close_pct / 100 * face_value),
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   - `m` — число купонов в год,
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   - `t_i` — время до платежа в годах (ACT/365F).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">3) Macaulay duration:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   D_M = (1 / P_abs) * sum( t_i * CF_i / (1 + y/m)^(m * t_i) )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">4) Modified duration:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   D_mod = D_M / (1 + y/m)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">5) Convexity (дискретная, как в Excel):
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">   Conv = (1 / P_abs) * sum( CF_i * t_i * (t_i + 1/m) / (1 + y/m)^(m * t_i + 2) )
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">6) DV01 (см. ниже).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1.5. DV01
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В Excel DV01 выводится в верхнем блоке (рядом с duration_n и convexity). Формула явно не дана, но по числам видно, что:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Macaulay duration ≈ 0.52 года.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Modified duration ≈ 0.45.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Цена ≈ 96.34% от 1 000 → P_abs ≈ 963.4.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- DV01 ≈ 45.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Это совместимо с формулой:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    DV01_excel ~ D_mod * P_abs * 1e-4 * (BaseNotional / FaceValue)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">где BaseNotional — некоторый базовый номинал (например, 10 000).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В PYTHON:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Реализуй функцию:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    dv01 = D_mod * P_abs * 1e-4 * base_notional / face_value
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Сделай `base_notional` параметром (по умолчанию 10_000), чтобы можно было подогнать точное соответствие Excel.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1.6. Индексы и их доходности
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В Excel доходности индексов Мосбиржи подтягиваются формулами вида:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    # пример: индекс гос. облигаций &lt; 1 года
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    RUGBITR1Y_yield := =@CbondsIndexValue("RUGBITR1Y"; $K$6)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    # пример: индекс корп. облигаций AAA
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    RUCBTRAAANS_yield := =@CbondsIndexValue("RUCBTRAAANS"; $K$6)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">и т.п. для:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- RUGBITR1Y
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- RUGBITR3Y
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- RUGBITR5Y
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- RUGBITR5+
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- RUCBTRAAANS
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- RUCBTRAANS
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- RUCBTRANS
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- RUCBTRBBBNS
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">и др.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В PYTHON:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Описать dataclass `IndexYields` с полями для всех нужных индексов.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Реализовать функцию, которая по дате возвращает `IndexYields` (например, из DataFrame).
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">1.7. Критерии активности рынка (EfirHistoryAgg)
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">-----------------------
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В Excel используются формулы:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    trading_days := =EfirHistoryAgg($B$1; J_ref-30; J_ref-1; "DOI")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    num_trades   := =EfirHistoryAgg($B$1; J_ref-30; J_ref-1; "DO")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    turnover     := =EfirHistoryAgg($B$1; J_ref-30; J_ref-1; "DOL")
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    issue_volume := =ReferenceParams($B$1; A8)  # SumMarketVal
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    turnover_ratio := turnover / issue_volume
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В `Template` это выводится как таблица:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Кол-во торговых дней — "выполняется" если ≥ 5.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Кол-во сделок — "выполняется" если ≥ 10.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Объем торгов / объем выпуска — "выполняется" если ≥ 0.10%.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Наличие торгов за последние 30 дней — "выполняется" если есть хотя бы один торговый день.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">И финальный вывод:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">- Активность рынка: "активный", если все четыре условия выполнены.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">В PYTHON:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">```python
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">@dataclass
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">class MarketActivityResult:
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    trading_days: int
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    num_trades: int
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    turnover_ratio: float
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    has_trades_last_30d: bool
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    is_active: bool
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Функция:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">python</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">def</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(197, 200, 198);">compute_market_activity</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    market_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    analysis_date</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>Timestamp</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    issue_volume</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    lookback_days</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">30</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    min_trading_days</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">5</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    min_num_trades</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">10</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    min_turnover_ratio</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">0.001</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">-</span><span class="token token operator">&gt;</span><span> MarketActivityResult</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"""
</span></span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    Полный аналог Excel-логики на базе:
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - trading_days = число дат с торгами в окне [analysis_date - lookback_days, analysis_date]
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - num_trades = суммарное число сделок
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - turnover_ratio = sum(turnover_value) / issue_volume
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - has_trades_last_30d = trading_days &gt; 0
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - is_active = все четыре условия выполняются.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">    """</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<h1 class="font-sans first:mt-xs mb-2 mt-4 font-semimedium text-lg leading-[1.5em] lg:text-xl" id="">======================================================================<br>
2. СТРУКТУРА И ЛОГИКА ЛИСТА "TEMPLATE"</h1>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Лист "Template" — отчёт, который ССЫЛАЕТСЯ на результаты Calculation.</p>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Типовая структура:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Блок «Информация по выпуску»:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">ISIN, эмитент, страна риска, сектор, отрасль.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Кол-во выпусков в обращении.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Рейтинги эмиссии, эмитента, гаранта (через ВПР/ВПР по листу Help Page).</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Блок «Информация по выпуску» (параметры выпуска):</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Дата выпуска</code>, <code>Объем в обращении</code>, <code>Дата погашения</code>, <code>Купон, %</code>, <code>Номинал</code>, <code>Кол-во купонных платежей в год</code>.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В Excel это ссылки на Calculation / ReferenceParams / BondDateParams.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Блок «Анализируемый период»:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Begin Date</code>, <code>End Date</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Блок «Активность рынка»:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">4 критерия (см. 1.7) + пороги.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Каждая строка имеет:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">текст «выполняется» / «не выполняется» через формулу вида:<br>
<code>=ЕСЛИ(ФАКТ &gt;= ПОРОГ; "выполняется"; "не выполняется")</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Блок «Рыночная котировка и доходности»:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Рыночная котировка, % от номинала</code> — ссылка на цену за End Date.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Доходность к погашению, % rub</code> — YTM * 100.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Дюрация к погашению, лет</code> — duration (из блока 1.4).</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>G-spread, б.п.</code> — из Calculation.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>КБД Московской биржи (g-curve), %</code> — G‑curve * 100.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Мод. дюрация (к погашению)</code> — duration_n.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>Выпуклость (к погашению)</code> — convexity.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>DV01</code> — DV01.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Блок «Сравнение с индексами»:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В первой колонке — подписи индексов.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Во второй — их доходности (в процентах) из CbondsIndexValue.</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Отдельно — индексная доходность vs YTM облигации (разностный анализ).</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">В PYTHON:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Описать итоговый объект:</p>
</li>
</ul>

</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    dv01</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    gcurve_yield</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    gspread_bp</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># блок активности рынка</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    market_activity</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> MarketActivityResult
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(150, 152, 150); font-family: inherit; font-style: italic;"># индексы</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    index_yields</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> IndexYields
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">И функцию:</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">python</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; background: transparent; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); border-radius: 3px; display: flex; line-height: 1.42857; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre; --scrollbar-thumb: oklch(var(--foreground-color) / 0.15); --scrollbar-track: transparent; scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-thumb) var(--scrollbar-track);"><code style="white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: inherit; font-family: inherit; line-height: 1.66667; padding: 8px;"><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(178, 148, 187); font-weight: bolder;">def</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(197, 200, 198);">build_bond_template</span><span class="token token punctuation">(</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    bond</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> BondStatic</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    market_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    gcurve_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    index_yields_df</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>DataFrame</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    analysis_date</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> pd</span><span class="token token punctuation">.</span><span>Timestamp</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    base_notional_for_dv01</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token token" style="color: rgb(222, 147, 95);">10_000.0</span><span class="token token punctuation">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span></span><span class="token token punctuation">)</span><span> </span><span class="token token operator">-</span><span class="token token operator">&gt;</span><span> BondTemplateResult</span><span class="token token punctuation">:</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span>    </span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">"""
</span></span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    Энд-ту-энд расчёт, функционально воспроизводящий Excel-листы 'Calculation' и 'Template':
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - строит расчётную таблицу по датам (аналог Calculation);
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - выбирает нужные значения на analysis_date или в заданном периоде;
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - считает YTM, дюрацию, мод. дюрацию, выпуклость, DV01 и G-spread;
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - считает критерии активности рынка;
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - подтягивает доходности индексов;
</span><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(181, 189, 104); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">    - собирает всё в BondTemplateResult.
</span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"><span class="token token triple-quoted-string" style="color: rgb(181, 189, 104);">    """</span><span>
</span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;"></span></code></span></div></div></div></pre></div>
<h1 class="font-sans first:mt-xs mb-2 mt-4 font-semimedium text-lg leading-[1.5em] lg:text-xl" id="">======================================================================<br>
3. СТРУКТУРА ПАКЕТА И КАЧЕСТВО КОДА</h1>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Предложенная структура модулей:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>models.py</code>       — dataclass’ы (BondStatic, Cashflow, IndexYields, MarketActivityResult, BondTemplateResult)</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>bond_math.py</code>    — кэшфлоу, YTM, дюрация, выпуклость, DV01</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>curves.py</code>       — G‑кривая и индексы</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>activity.py</code>     — критерии активности рынка</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>calculation_table.py</code> — build_calculation_table(...)</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2"><code>template_builder.py</code>  — build_bond_template(...)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Сделай:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Чёткие сигнатуры функций (см. выше).</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Докстринги, которые ССЫЛАЮТСЯ на соответствующие Excel‑формулы:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">пример: «эквивалент формулы Excel <code>=ЕСЛИОШИБКА((M[i]-P[i])*10000;"")</code>».</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Как минимум один пример / юнит‑тест, который:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">жёстко задаёт входные данные для одной даты:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">price = 96.34% от 1000,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">ytm = 16.55%,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">gcurve = 13.57%,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">duration_years ≈ 0.52,</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">рассчитывает все метрики и проверяет, что:</p>
<ul class="marker:text-quiet list-disc">
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">D_M ≈ 0.52,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">D_mod ≈ 0.45,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">convexity ≈ 0.58,</p>
</li>
<li class="py-0 my-0 prose-p:pt-0 prose-p:mb-2 prose-p:my-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:pt-0 [&amp;&gt;p]:mb-2 [&amp;&gt;p]:my-0">
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">gspread ≈ 298.48 b.p.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-2 [&amp;+p]:mt-4 [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:inline-block [&amp;_strong:has(+br)]:pb-2">Фокус: ПОЛНАЯ ФУНКЦИОНАЛЬНАЯ РЕПЛИКАЦИЯ Excel‑логики с явными аналогами Excel‑формул в комментариях и докстрингах.</p>
<div class="w-full md:max-w-[90vw]"><pre class="not-prose w-full rounded font-mono text-sm font-extralight"><div class="codeWrapper text-light selection:text-super selection:bg-super/10 my-md relative flex flex-col rounded-lg font-mono text-sm font-normal bg-subtler"><div class="translate-y-xs -translate-x-xs bottom-xl mb-xl flex h-0 items-start justify-end sm:sticky sm:top-xs"><div class="overflow-hidden rounded-full border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-base"><div class="border-subtlest ring-subtlest divide-subtlest bg-subtler"><button data-testid="copy-code-button" aria-label="Скопировать код" type="button" class="focus-visible:bg-subtle hover:bg-subtle text-quiet  hover:text-foreground dark:hover:bg-subtle font-sans focus:outline-none outline-none outline-transparent transition duration-300 ease-out select-none items-center relative group/button font-semimedium justify-center text-center items-center rounded-full cursor-pointer active:scale-[0.97] active:duration-150 active:ease-outExpo origin-center whitespace-nowrap inline-flex text-sm h-8 aspect-square" data-state="closed"><div class="flex items-center min-w-0 gap-two justify-center"><div class="flex shrink-0 items-center justify-center size-4"><svg role="img" class="inline-flex fill-current" width="16" height="16"><use xlink:href="#pplx-icon-copy"></use></svg></div></div></button></div></div></div><div class="-mt-xl"><div><div data-testid="code-language-indicator" class="text-quiet bg-subtle py-xs px-sm inline-block rounded-br rounded-tl-lg text-xs font-thin">text</div></div><div><span style="font-size: inherit; </span></span><span style="opacity: 1; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(197, 200, 198); background-color: transparent; flex-shrink: 0; padding: 8px; text-align: right; user-select: none;">Если нужно, можно отдельно сделать «короткую» версию промта только с сигнатурами функций и перечислением формул, без описания структуры пакета.
